/addConfigLines.description:
Add the configuration (name + uri) of each NFT to the account data.

# Accounts

0. `[writable]` Candy Machine account
1. `[signer]` Candy Machine authority

post.description:
Add the configuration (name + uri) of each NFT to the account data.

# Accounts

0. `[writable]` Candy Machine account
1. `[signer]` Candy Machine authority

/initialize.description:
Initialize the candy machine account with the specified data.

# Accounts

0. `[writable]` Candy Machine account (must be pre-allocated but zero content)
1. `[writable]` Authority PDA (seeds `["candy_machine", candy machine id]`)
2. `[]` Candy Machine authority
3. `[signer]` Payer
4. `[]` Collection metadata
5. `[]` Collection mint
6. `[]` Collection master edition
7. `[signer]` Collection update authority
8. `[writable]` Collection authority record
9. `[]` Token Metadata program
10. `[]` System program

post.description:
Initialize the candy machine account with the specified data.

# Accounts

0. `[writable]` Candy Machine account (must be pre-allocated but zero content)
1. `[writable]` Authority PDA (seeds `["candy_machine", candy machine id]`)
2. `[]` Candy Machine authority
3. `[signer]` Payer
4. `[]` Collection metadata
5. `[]` Collection mint
6. `[]` Collection master edition
7. `[signer]` Collection update authority
8. `[writable]` Collection authority record
9. `[]` Token Metadata program
10. `[]` System program

parameters.name: Account: candyMachine
parameters.description:
Candy Machine account. The account space must be allocated to allow accounts larger
than 10kb.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description:
Candy Machine account. The account space must be allocated to allow accounts larger
than 10kb.

parameters.name: Account: authorityPda
parameters.description: Authority PDA used to verify minted NFTs to the collection.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Authority PDA used to verify minted NFTs to the collection.

parameters.name: Account: authority
parameters.description: Candy Machine authority. This is the address that controls the upate of the candy machine.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Candy Machine authority. This is the address that controls the upate of the candy machine.

parameters.name: Account: collectionMasterEdition
parameters.description: Master Edition account of the collection.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Master Edition account of the collection.

parameters.name: Account: collectionUpdateAuthority
parameters.description:
Update authority of the collection. This needs to be a signer so the candy
machine can approve a delegate to verify minted NFTs to the collection.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description:
Update authority of the collection. This needs to be a signer so the candy
machine can approve a delegate to verify minted NFTs to the collection.

parameters.name: Account: collectionAuthorityRecord
parameters.description: Collection authority record. The delegate is used to verify NFTs.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Collection authority record. The delegate is used to verify NFTs.

/initializeV2.description:
Initialize the candy machine account with the specified data and token standard.

# Accounts

0. `[writable]` Candy Machine account (must be pre-allocated but zero content)
1. `[writable]` Authority PDA (seeds `["candy_machine", candy machine id]`)
2. `[]` Candy Machine authority
3. `[signer]` Payer
4. `[]` Collection metadata
5. `[]` Collection mint
6. `[]` Collection master edition
7. `[signer]` Collection update authority
8. `[writable]` Collection metadata delegate record
9. `[]` Token Metadata program
10. `[]` System program
11. `[]` Instructions sysvar account
12. `[optional]` Token Authorization Rules program
13. `[optional]` Token authorization rules account

post.description:

9. `[]` Token Metadata program
10. `[]` System program
11. `[]` Instructions sysvar account
12. `[optional]` Token Authorization Rules program
13. `[optional]` Token authorization rules account

/mint.description:
Mint an NFT.

Only the candy machine mint authority is allowed to mint.

# Accounts

0. `[writable]` Candy Machine account (must be pre-allocated but zero content)
1. `[writable]` Authority PDA (seeds `["candy_machine", candy machine id]`)
2. `[signer]` Candy Machine mint authority
3. `[signer]` Payer
4. `[writable]` Mint account of the NFT
5. `[signer]` Mint authority of the NFT
6. `[writable]` Metadata account of the NFT
7. `[writable]` Master edition account of the NFT
8. `[optional]` Collection authority record
9. `[]` Collection mint
10. `[writable]` Collection metadata
11. `[]` Collection master edition
12. `[]` Collection update authority
13. `[]` Token Metadata program
14. `[]` SPL Token program
15. `[]` System program
16. `[]` SlotHashes sysvar cluster data.

post.description:
Mint an NFT.

Only the candy machine mint authority is allowed to mint.

# Accounts

0. `[writable]` Candy Machine account (must be pre-allocated but zero content)
1. `[writable]` Authority PDA (seeds `["candy_machine", candy machine id]`)
2. `[signer]` Candy Machine mint authority
3. `[signer]` Payer
4. `[writable]` Mint account of the NFT
5. `[signer]` Mint authority of the NFT
6. `[writable]` Metadata account of the NFT
7. `[writable]` Master edition account of the NFT
8. `[optional]` Collection authority record
9. `[]` Collection mint
10. `[writable]` Collection metadata
11. `[]` Collection master edition
12. `[]` Collection update authority
13. `[]` Token Metadata program
14. `[]` SPL Token program
15. `[]` System program
16. `[]` SlotHashes sysvar cluster data.

parameters.name: Account: authorityPda
parameters.description:
Candy machine authority account. This is the account that holds a delegate
to verify an item into the collection.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description:
Candy machine authority account. This is the account that holds a delegate
to verify an item into the collection.

parameters.name: Account: mintAuthority
parameters.description: Candy machine mint authority (mint only allowed for the mint_authority).

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Candy machine mint authority (mint only allowed for the mint_authority).

parameters.name: Account: payer
parameters.description: Payer for the transaction and account allocation (rent).

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Payer for the transaction and account allocation (rent).

parameters.name: Account: nftMint
parameters.description: Mint account of the NFT. The account will be initialized if necessary.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Mint account of the NFT. The account will be initialized if necessary.

parameters.name: Account: nftMintAuthority
parameters.description: Mint authority of the NFT. In most cases this will be the owner of the NFT.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Mint authority of the NFT. In most cases this will be the owner of the NFT.

parameters.name: Account: nftMetadata
parameters.description: Metadata account of the NFT. This account must be uninitialized.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Metadata account of the NFT. This account must be uninitialized.

parameters.name: Account: nftMasterEdition
parameters.description: Master edition account of the NFT. The account will be initialized if necessary.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Master edition account of the NFT. The account will be initialized if necessary.

parameters.name: Account: collectionAuthorityRecord
parameters.description:
Collection authority record account is either the delegated authority record (legacy)
or a metadata delegate record for the `authority_pda`. The delegate is set when a new collection
is set to the candy machine.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description:
Collection authority record account is either the delegated authority record (legacy)
or a metadata delegate record for the `authority_pda`. The delegate is set when a new collection
is set to the candy machine.

parameters.name: Account: collectionMint
parameters.description: Mint account of the collection NFT.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Mint account of the collection NFT.

parameters.name: Account: collectionMetadata
parameters.description: Metadata account of the collection NFT.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Metadata account of the collection NFT.

parameters.name: Account: collectionMasterEdition
parameters.description: Master edition account of the collection NFT.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Master edition account of the collection NFT.

parameters.name: Account: collectionUpdateAuthority
parameters.description: Update authority of the collection NFT.

schema.title: pubkey
schema.description: Update authority of the collection NFT.

/mintV2.description:
Mint an NFT.

Only the candy machine mint authority is allowed to mint. This handler mints both
NFTs and Programmable NFTs.

# Accounts

0. `[writable]` Candy Machine account (must be pre-allocated but zero content)
1. `[writable]` Authority PDA (seeds `["candy_machine", candy machine id]`)
2. `[signer]` Candy Machine mint authority
3. `[signer]` Payer
4. `[writable]` Mint account of the NFT
5. `[]` Mint authority of the NFT
6. `[writable]` Metadata account of the NFT
7. `[writable]` Master edition account of the NFT
8. `[optional, writable]` Destination token account
9. `[optional, writable]` Token record
10. `[]` Collection delegate or authority record
11. `[]` Collection mint
12. `[writable]` Collection metadata
13. `[]` Collection master edition
14. `[]` Collection update authority
15. `[]` Token Metadata program
16. `[]` SPL Token program
17. `[optional]` SPL Associated Token program
18. `[]` System program
19. `[optional]` Instructions sysvar account
20. `[]` SlotHashes sysvar cluster data.

post.description:
Mint an NFT.

Only the candy machine mint authority is allowed to mint. This handler mints both
NFTs and Programmable NFTs.

# Accounts

0. `[writable]` Candy Machine account (must be pre-allocated but zero content)
1. `[writable]` Authority PDA (seeds `["candy_machine", candy machine id]`)
2. `[signer]` Candy Machine mint authority
3. `[signer]` Payer
4. `[writable]` Mint account of the NFT
5. `[]` Mint authority of the NFT
6. `[writable]` Metadata account of the NFT
7. `[writable]` Master edition account of the NFT
8. `[optional, writable]` Destination token account
9. `[optional, writable]` Token record
10. `[]` Collection delegate or authority record
11. `[]` Collection mint
12. `[writable]` Collection metadata
13. `[]` Collection master edition
14. `[]` Collection update authority
15. `[]` Token Metadata program
16. `[]` SPL Token program
17. `[optional]` SPL Associated Token program
18. `[]` System program
19. `[optional]` Instructions sysvar account
20. `[]` SlotHashes sysvar cluster data.

/setAuthority.description:
Set a new authority of the candy machine.

# Accounts

0. `[writable]` Candy Machine account
1. `[signer]` Candy Machine authority

post.description:
Set a new authority of the candy machine.

# Accounts

0. `[writable]` Candy Machine account
1. `[signer]` Candy Machine authority

/setCollection.description:
Set the collection mint for the candy machine.

# Accounts

0. `[writable]` Candy Machine account (must be pre-allocated but zero content)
1. `[signer]` Candy Machine authority
2. `[]` Authority PDA (seeds `["candy_machine", candy machine id]`)
3. `[signer]` Payer
4. `[]` Collection mint
5. `[]` Collection metadata
6. `[writable]` Collection authority record
7. `[signer]` New collection update authority
8. `[]` Collection metadata
9. `[]` Collection mint
10. `[]` New collection master edition
11. `[]` New collection authority record
12. `[]` Token Metadata program
13. `[]` System program

post.description:
